string-array.name: potluck_descriptions
string-array.item: The melodious mashup of the culinary world
Making nachos socially acceptable beyond game day. You don\'t have to thank us, so long as we get a bite of this casserole.
There are vegetables in it, so it\'s healthy!
God bless the letter B. That\'s all we have to say about this potluck masterpiece.
